attributes.title: Million Dollars, But… Season 2 - Official Trailer
attributes.caption: "Million Dollars, But" is back and bigger than ever for its second season! Find out what heinous, horrible and hilarious things the Rooster Teeth crew would do for a million bucks.

attributes.title: Mime Time & Serial Hugger
attributes.caption: Welcome back for season 2 of "Million Dollars, But…”! This week, the RWBY gang discusses becoming mimes and hugging strangers for 30 seconds.

attributes.title: Puppet Arms & Giant Womb
attributes.caption: Join Burnie, Adam, and Blaine as they discuss the finer points of having puppet arms and being born from a giant womb every day.
attributes.description: Join Burnie, Adam, and Blaine as they discuss the finer points of having puppet arms and being born from a giant womb every day.

attributes.title: Biggest Belieber & Knife-hand
attributes.caption: This week Barbara and the Funhaus gang livestream their bathroom breaks and become the world’s biggest Justin Bieber fans.

attributes.title: Achievement Hunter Animal Attack
attributes.caption: Join the Achievement Hunters as they decide if a million dollars is worth random acts of violence from animals or having baby diapers hurled at their faces.
